languages.text: "Выявлено глубокое эмоциональное переживание, снижающее эффективность единицы Соломон. Предлагаю комплекс неинвазивных мер, призванных стабилизировать соратника".
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Solomorne broken during the Jealousy dialogue.

languages.text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Solomorne broken during the Jealousy dialogue.
languages.original_text: "Выявлено глубокое эмоциональное переживание, снижающее эффективность единицы Соломон. Предлагаю комплекс неинвазивных мер, призванных стабилизировать соратника".

traits.locale_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that hampers the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

"I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

languages.text: 「ユニット・ソロモーンの性能を妨げている深刻な感情的動揺を検知した。仲間の安定を図るために、非侵襲的な措置を提案する」
languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

traits.locale_text: 「ユニット・ソロモーンの性能を妨げている深刻な感情的動揺を検知した。仲間の安定を図るために、非侵襲的な措置を提案する」

languages.text: "Ich registriere eine tiefe emotionale Unruhe, die die Leistung der Einheit Solomorne beeinträchtigt. Ich schlage mehrere nicht-invasive Maßnahmen vor, um meinen Kameraden zu stabilisieren."
languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

traits.locale_text: "Ich registriere eine tiefe emotionale Unruhe, die die Leistung der Einheit Solomorne beeinträchtigt. Ich schlage mehrere nicht-invasive Maßnahmen vor, um meinen Kameraden zu stabilisieren."

languages.text: «Registro una profunda perturbación emocional que afecta al rendimiento de la unidad Solomorne. Propongo una serie de medidas no invasivas para estabilizar a mi camarada».
languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

traits.locale_text: «Registro una profunda perturbación emocional que afecta al rendimiento de la unidad Solomorne. Propongo una serie de medidas no invasivas para estabilizar a mi camarada».

languages.text: “检测到非常严重的情绪困扰，降低了索罗蒙这一单位的效率。我提议实施全套非侵入性措施，以此稳定我的战友，提高其效率表现。”
languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

traits.locale_text: “检测到非常严重的情绪困扰，降低了索罗蒙这一单位的效率。我提议实施全套非侵入性措施，以此稳定我的战友，提高其效率表现。”

languages.text: "Solomorne biriminin performansını sekteye uğratan derin bir duygusal dalgalanma saptıyorum. Yoldaşımın dengelenmesi adına bazı küçük önlemler uygulanmasını tavsiye ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne biriminin performansını sekteye uğratan derin bir duygusal dalgalanma saptıyorum. Yoldaşımın dengelenmesi adına bazı küçük önlemler uygulanmasını tavsiye ediyorum."

languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

languages.text: « J'enregistre un profond trouble émotionnel qui entrave les performances de l'unité Solomorne. Je suggère l'application de mesures non intrusives pour stabiliser mon camarade. »
languages.original_text: "I am registering a deep emotional disturbance that is hampering the performance of the unit Solomorne. I propose a set of non-invasive measures with the aim of stabilising my comrade."

traits.locale_text: « J'enregistre un profond trouble émotionnel qui entrave les performances de l'unité Solomorne. Je suggère l'application de mesures non intrusives pour stabiliser mon camarade. »
